extendedInfo.description: An add-on for the SlideIT keyboard.This is a skin addon to change the look of the SlideIT keyboard to have Gray, White and Black colors.SlideIT keyboard is not included and must be installed separately.***This theme will work only with SlideIT version 5.0 and upDasur Ltd addon skin.

reviews.title: A really fine swiping keyboard
reviews.comment: I couldn\'t stand software keyboards until swiping-style came along. I really like Swype, but am happy to have SlideIt, also. It seems as good, and has several strengths, including adjustable keyboard size and very good word recognition and adjustment. A fun addition to my repertoire of excellent typing gadgets.
reviews.author: Ken Manheimer

reviews.title: not tablet optimized
reviews.comment: too small in landscape. ridiculous and inefficient. Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Htc Rezound
reviews.comment: I can\'t find the app anywhere on my phones desktop. Wth. It should be right there.
reviews.author: A Google User
